comments.en:
Multifunction device: printer/scanner/copier.

Uniprint driver "cdj550.upp" works very well, too. Max resolution is 300x300. The PCL modifications to allow "cdj550.upp" to print in 600x600 resolution don't work. 600dpi works in B&W, but not color. (If you get color to work, please post!) Other drivers that mostly work are "cdj670", "cdj1600", and "pcl3"/"hpdj" (Model=unspec, ColorMode=CMYK). Other PCL3 drivers may work.

To get all functionality of this printer working under Linux, especially also the non-printing features, like scamnning, printer status, maintenance, and photo download from memory cards, use the HPLIP driver package from HP.

Copying should just work, it does not need the PC.

Consumables/Refills: 2 cartridges - $30.00 each
